modName: Lightning ENB for Climates of Tamriel
summary: A colorful yet realistic ENB for regular gameplay with weathers and interior day and night cycles.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]Lightning ENB[/size][/b]

A saturated and colorful preset while still striving for realism. It's been cobbled together over a period of months and it's been the one I've been using for gameplay for a while. I've tweaked it for ages and I've finally found the time to add the weathers and release it.


[b][size=4]This ENB was created for[/size][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]Climates of Tamriel[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39799/?]Climates of Tamriel Weather Patch[/url]
NORMAL NIGHT SETTINGS from both of the above mods
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url]

While this ENB will work with other weathers, it'll look very odd. It will likely look very bright with any other interior lighting mod.


[b][size=4]How to Install[/size][/b]


1. Install the above mods
2. [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]Download and install enb series [/url]v.262 and up
3. Download and unzip one of the two files here, overwriting as needed.

[b][size=4]Features[/size][/b]

Individual weather settings intended for visibly appealing realism
Day and Night settings for interiors. Caves are much scarier at night but are still fairly dark during the day.
SMAA and Dithering provided by SweetFX
Dark nights and Dark interiors. Bring torches
Unobtrusive Depth of Field

Known Issues

Some weathers have more yellow tinted sunlight. I'm really not sure which ones are doing it, however.
Feel free to PM me if enb updates far enough that I need to update this mod any.

Other Recommended mods

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220/?]Verdant[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water 2[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49344/?]Vivid Landscapes[/url]
author: lightningo
